ProteinName	Ras-related protein Rab-40C (Rar-like protein) (Ras-like protein family member 8C) (SOCS box-containing protein RAR3)
GeneName	RAB40C RARL RASL8C
Length	281
Function	Probable substrate-recognition component of a SCF-like ECS (Elongin-Cullin-SOCS-box protein) E3 ubiquitin ligase complex which mediates the ubiquitination and subsequent proteasomal degradation of target proteins.
Subcellular Location	Cell membrane
